text: Amazon chime includes chat rooms for
ongoing discussions around topics teams
projects and more this video shows you
how to use the features in chat
rooms start a chat room by choosing
rooms from the Launchpad then new room
give the chat room a name and choose
create Amazon chime prompts you to add
members from your contact list chat room
are private and By Invitation Only
choose each user to invite locate users
by typing the first part of their names
when you invite a user they receive an
Amazon chime notification and the chat
room is automatically opened for them on
their desktop app if they on a mobile
app they receive a push
notification members are listed on the
right side of the chat room in chat
rooms unread count indicators are only
displayed for post to members with the
chat room open members are present in
the chat room when they have the room
open and the app is online close the
chat room by choosing the Red X next to
its name you remain a member you just
won't see unread message counts and
others see you listed under not
present members with a crown next to
their names are chat room administrators
a member can access controls by choosing
settings members have the option to
leave the chat room after you leave a
chat room you must be
reinvites settings provide provides you
with options to add or edit members edit
the chat room name or invite policy and
leave or delete the chat room if you
delete a chat room you delete the chat
room for all members and the thread
history is no longer
available you cannot leave a chat room
if you are the only administrator select
another member and promote them to
administrator before leaving to make
someone else an administrator choose
settings then edit members select a
member and choose make administrator go
through the same process to remove this
level of
control because chat rooms are
continuous conversations the app mention
feature allows you to send a noisy
notification which is a sound on the
desktop or a push notification to a
mobile device rather than just showing
an unread count next to the chat room
name use the at mention feature to call
someone's attention to a message that
you are posting for them type the at
symbol or choose at mention and select a
member's name the ire room is at all or
at present
members when a person views the thread
at mentions are bolded with their names
highlighted to make them easier to find
Amazon chime pops open in the chat room
if the person you chose for an ad
mention does not have the chat room open
open but is online on the desktop app
choose the phone receiver icon to start
an instant meeting then choose which
members to invite to the call Select a
single member the entire room or a
select
few and that's how you keep the
conversation going with Amazon chime
